mapper.sql: o.ID, o.C_NAME, o.C_LEGAL_PERSON, o.C_LEVEL, o.C_CARD_NO, o.C_GRANT_TIME, o.C_CONTACT_NAME, o.C_TEL, o.C_AREA, o.C_STATUS, o.C_PLATFORM_PERCENT, o.C_PROPERTY_PERCENT, o.C_MEMBER_PERCENT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property ( C_NAME, C_LEGAL_PERSON, C_LEVEL, C_CARD_NO, C_GRANT_TIME, C_CONTACT_NAME, C_TEL, C_AREA, C_STATUS, C_PLATFORM_PERCENT, C_PROPERTY_PERCENT, C_MEMBER_PERCENT ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{legalPerson}, #{level}, #{cardNo}, #{grantTime}, #{contactName}, #{tel}, #{area}, #{status}, #{platformPercent}, #{propertyPercent}, #{memberPercent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE property SET C_NAME = #{name}, C_LEGAL_PERSON = #{legalPerson}, C_LEVEL = #{level}, C_CARD_NO = #{cardNo}, C_GRANT_TIME = #{grantTime}, C_CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName}, C_TEL = #{tel}, C_AREA = #{area}, C_STATUS = #{status}, C_PLATFORM_PERCENT = #{platformPercent}, C_PROPERTY_PERCENT = #{propertyPercent}, C_MEMBER_PERCENT = #{memberPercent} WHERE ID = #{id}
